text: Nihsansaya, phira'aunane dharativara utpata (phasada) majivala hota, ani tithalya lokanca (eka eka) gata banavila hota. Tyancya eka gatala durbala banavuna thevale hote. Tyancya lahana mulanna tara maruna takata ase ani mulinna jivanta soduna deta ase. Nihsansaya to motha duracari (va dusta) hota
